feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required metadata changes to frontend/index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions with light/dark palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with updated title and Open Graph meta tags for social sharing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the ValentineProposal component inside a full‑screen container.
frontend/src/components/FloatingThoughts: Animated floating words and hearts that react to hover and touch states.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveLoveL: Interactive love‑letter reader revealing paragraphs progressively with navigation and progress indicators.
frontend/src/components/LastChanceNoModa: Modal warning shown when clicking No, featuring an angry panda and a confirm‑Yes button.
frontend/src/components/ValentineProposa: Main proposal flow with evasive No button, Yes confirmation, progressive notes, and supporting components.
frontend/src/content/valentineCopy.ts: Centralized text content including proposal question, love notes, progressive notes, and full love letter.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Computes collision‑free positions for a button to evade obstacles within a container, updating position and scale when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, persistence, and status handling using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, animations, and decorative backgrounds for a pink romantic UI theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, plugins, and theme extensions using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and state for managing updates to page title and Open Graph tags.
